title: How many terabytes is 1000 gigabytes? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are two definitions for this: Either one terabyte is 1000 gigaytes or one terabyte is 1024 gigabites. Using the first definition, the answer is of course 1. Using the second definition 1000 gigabytes are 1000/1024 terabytes, meaning a bit less than one terabyte.
Depending on who is using the term a 1000 gigabytes = one terabyte or is 1024 GB = one terabyte.
